00018 AnswerWaiter::AnswerWaiter()
00019 {
00020     ObjectMutex.EnterMutex();
00021
00022     // Initialise object
00023     Waiter.Reset();
00024     IsFree = true;
00025     MessageId = 0;
00026     AnswerMessage = NULL;
00027
00028     ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00029 }
00030
00031 AnswerWaiter::~AnswerWaiter()
00032 {
00033     // ObjectMutex.EnterMutex(); will be done in free
00034
00035     Free();
00036
00037     // ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00038 }
00039
00040 bool AnswerWaiter::Use( unsigned int eMessageId )
00041 {
00042     ObjectMutex.EnterMutex();
00043
00044     if ( IsFree != true )
00045     {
00046         ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00047         return false;
00048     }
00049
00050     // Delete message if any
00051     if ( AnswerMessage != NULL )
00052     {
00053         delete AnswerMessage;
00054         AnswerMessage = NULL;
00055     }
00056
00057     // Say I am not free
00058     IsFree = false;
00059
00060     // Put my value for the message waited
00061     MessageId = eMessageId;
00062
00063     // Reset event
00064     Waiter.Reset();
00065
00066     ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00067
00068     return true;
00069 }
00070
00071 void AnswerWaiter::Free()
00072 {
00073     ObjectMutex.EnterMutex();
00074
00075     // Delete message if any
00076     if ( AnswerMessage != NULL )
00077     {
00078         delete AnswerMessage;
00079         AnswerMessage = NULL;
00080     }
00081
00082     // Say I am free...
00083     IsFree = true;
00084
00085     ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00086 }
00087
00088 XMLMessage * AnswerWaiter::GetAnswer(unsigned int TimeToWait)
00089 {
00090     XMLMessage * tmpMessage;
00091     int NbLoop;
00092
00093     //
00094     for( NbLoop = 0; ; NbLoop++ )
00095     {
00096         // Is the message already here ?
00097         ObjectMutex.EnterMutex();
00098         if ( AnswerMessage != NULL )
00099         {
00100             // Get the message pointer
00101             tmpMessage = AnswerMessage;
00102             AnswerMessage = NULL;
00103
00104             // This place is free, we got the message
00105             Free();
00106
00107             ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00108             return tmpMessage;
00109         }
00110
00111         // Let's me AnswerManager complete me...
00112         ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00113
00114         if ( NbLoop > 0 )
00115         {
00116             break;
00117         }
00118
00119         // Wait for the result...
00120         Waiter.Wait(TimeToWait);
00121     }
00122
00123     // This place is free, even if we do not get the message
00124     Free();
00125
00126     return NULL;
00127 }

00129 AnswersManager::AnswersManager()
00130 {
00131 }
00132
00133 AnswersManager::~AnswersManager()
00134 {
00135     AnswerWaiter * pWaiter;
00136
00137     WaitersList.Lock();
00138
00139     // Destroy all waiters information
00140     while( WaitersList.GetNumberOfElements() > 0 )
00141     {
00142          pWaiter = WaitersList.ExtractFirst();
00143          if ( pWaiter != (AnswerWaiter *) NULL )
00144          {
00145             delete pWaiter;
00146          }
00147     }
00148
00149     WaitersList.Unlock();
00150 }
00151
00152 AnswerWaiter * AnswersManager::CreateAnswerWaiter(unsigned int MessageId)
00153 {
00154     AnswerWaiter * pWaiterInfo = NULL;
00155
00156     WaitersList.Lock();
00157
00158     // Is there any free waiterinfo in my list ?
00159     for( WaitersList.First(); WaitersList.NotAtEnd(); WaitersList.Next() )
00160     {
00161         if ( WaitersList.GetCurrent()->Use(MessageId) )
00162         {
00163             // We've got a waiter info for this waiter...
00164             pWaiterInfo = WaitersList.GetCurrent();
00165             break;
00166         }
00167     }
00168
00169     if ( pWaiterInfo == NULL )
00170     {
00171         // Create a new waiter element for this waiter
00172         pWaiterInfo = new OMISCID_TLM AnswerWaiter;
00173         if ( pWaiterInfo == NULL )
00174         {
00175             OmiscidError( "AnswersManager::WaitAndGetAnswer: no more memory.\n" );
00176             WaitersList.Unlock();
00177             return NULL;
00178         }
00179         pWaiterInfo->Use(MessageId);
00180
00181         // Add it to the list
00182         WaitersList.AddTail(pWaiterInfo);
00183     }
00184
00185     // Unlock the list
00186     WaitersList.Unlock();
00187
00188     return pWaiterInfo;
00189 }
00190
00191 bool AnswersManager::CheckMessage(XMLMessage* msg, unsigned int msg_id)
00192 {
00193     xmlAttrPtr attr = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("id", msg->GetRootNode());
00194     if(attr)
00195     {
00196         unsigned int the_id = 0;
00197         sscanf((const char*)attr->children->content, "%08x", &the_id);
00198         return the_id == msg_id;
00199     }
00200     return false;
00201 }
00202
00203 bool AnswersManager::PushAnswer(XMLMessage * Msg)
00204 {
00205     AnswerWaiter * pWaiter;
00206
00207     if ( Msg == NULL )
00208     {
00209         return false;
00210     }
00211
00212     WaitersList.Lock();
00213
00214     // Is there AnswerWaiter for this message ?
00215     for( WaitersList.First(); WaitersList.NotAtEnd(); WaitersList.Next() )
00216     {
00217         pWaiter = WaitersList.GetCurrent();
00218
00219         // Lock this waiter
00220         pWaiter->ObjectMutex.EnterMutex();
00221
00222         if ( pWaiter->IsFree == false && CheckMessage(Msg, pWaiter->MessageId) )
00223         {
00224             // We've got a waiter info for this waiter...
00225             // Copy the message for the waiter
00226             pWaiter->AnswerMessage = new OMISCID_TLM XMLMessage(*Msg);
00227             pWaiter->ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00228
00229             pWaiter->Waiter.Signal();
00230
00231             WaitersList.Unlock();
00232
00233             // OmiscidTrace( "AnswersManager::PushAnswer: PushMessage ok.\n" );
00234
00235             return true;
00236         }
00237
00238         // Unlock the waiter
00239         pWaiter->ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00240     }
00241
00242     // Do nothing with this message... probably timeout...
00243     OmiscidTrace( "AnswersManager::PushAnswer: no waiters (probably timeout).\n" );
00244
00245     // Unlock the list
00246     WaitersList.Unlock();
00247
00248     return false;
00249 }

00252 ControlClient::ControlClient(unsigned int serviceId)
00253 : TcpClient(), id(1)
00254 {
00255     TcpClient::SetTcpNoDelay(true);
00256
00257     TcpClient::SetServiceId(serviceId);
00258
00259     // Ask to receive messge on my XMLTreeParser side
00260     TcpClient::AddCallbackObject( this );
00261
00262     // XMLTreeParser::StartThread();
00263
00264     // By default, I will process the ConrolFlow by myself
00265     callback    = NULL;
00266     userDataPtr = 0;
00267
00268     // In order to check parse data
00269     // Initialise XsdValidators for :
00270     // - control answer validation
00271     ControlAnswerValidator.CreateSchemaFromString( ControlAnswerXsdSchema );
00272 #ifdef DEBUG
00273     // - control query validation in debug mode
00274     ControlQueryValidator.CreateSchemaFromString( ControlQueryXsdSchema );
00275 #endif
00276 }

00280     InOutputAttribute * pAtt;
00281
00282     while( List.GetNumberOfElements() > 0 )
00283     {
00284         pAtt = List.ExtractFirst();

00292
00293 void ControlClient::Init()
00294 {
00295     VariableAttribute * pVar;
00296
00297     // Empty variable names lists
00298     listVariableName.Empty();
00299     listInputName.Empty();
00300     listOutputName.Empty();
00301     listInOutputName.Empty();
00302
00303     // Empty InOutputAttribute lists
00304     EmptyInOutputAttributeList( listInputAttr );
00305     EmptyInOutputAttributeList( listOutputAttr );
00306     EmptyInOutputAttributeList( listInOutputAttr );
00307
00308     // Empty VariableAttribnut list
00309     while( listVariableAttr.GetNumberOfElements() > 0 )
00310     {
00311         pVar = listVariableAttr.ExtractFirst();
00312         if ( pVar != (VariableAttribute *)NULL )
00313         {
00314             delete pVar;
00315         }
00316     }
00317 }
00318
00319 ControlClient::~ControlClient()
00320 {
00321     TcpClient::RemoveAllCallbackObjects();
00322     TcpClient::Stop();
00323
00324     XMLTreeParser::StopThread(0);
00325
00326     for(listVariableAttr.First(); listVariableAttr.NotAtEnd();
00327         listVariableAttr.Next())
00328     {
00329         delete listVariableAttr.GetCurrent();
00330         listVariableAttr.RemoveCurrent();
00331     }
00332
00333     for(listInputAttr.First(); listInputAttr.NotAtEnd(); listInputAttr.Next())
00334     {
00335         delete listInputAttr.GetCurrent();
00336         listInputAttr.RemoveCurrent();
00337     }
00338
00339     for(listOutputAttr.First(); listOutputAttr.NotAtEnd();
00340         listOutputAttr.Next())
00341     {
00342         delete listOutputAttr.GetCurrent();
00343         listOutputAttr.RemoveCurrent();
00344     }
00345 }

00347 bool ControlClient::ConnectToCtrlServer(const SimpleString host, int port)
00348 {
00349     try
00350     {
00351         // We do not need now a XmlTreeParser
00352         XMLTreeParser::StartThread();
00353         ConnectToServer(host, port);
00354         return true;
00355     }
00356     catch(SocketException& e)
00357     {
00358         e.Display();
00359         return false;
00360     }
00361 }
00362
00363 bool ControlClient::QueryGlobalDescription()
00364 {
00365     SimpleString request("");
00366     XMLMessage* msg = QueryToServer(request);
00367     if(msg)
00368     {
00369         ProcessGlobalDescription(msg);
00370         delete msg;
00371         return true;
00372     }
00373     return false;
00374 }
00375
00376 VariableAttribute* ControlClient::QueryVariableDescription(const SimpleString var_name)
00377 {
00378     VariableAttribute* var_attr = FindVariable(var_name);
00379
00380     bool name_in_list = true;
00381
00382     if(!var_attr)
00383     {
00384         if(!NameInList(var_name, listVariableName))
00385         {
00386             OmiscidTrace( "Unknown variable '%s', ask to the service.\n", var_name.GetStr());
00387             name_in_list = false;
00388         }
00389     }
00390
00391     SimpleString request = "<variable name=\"" + var_name + "\"/>";
00392     XMLMessage* msg = QueryToServer(request);
00393     if(msg)
00394     {
00395         VariableAttribute* attr = NULL;
00396         if(msg->GetRootNode()->children != NULL)
00397         {
00398             attr = ProcessVariableDescription(msg->GetRootNode()->children, var_attr);
00399         }
00400         if(!var_attr && attr) listVariableAttr.Add(attr);
00401         else if(var_attr && !attr)
00402         {
00403             listVariableAttr.Remove(var_attr);
00404             delete var_attr;
00405         }
00406
00407         if(name_in_list && !attr) listVariableName.Remove(var_name);
00408         else if(!name_in_list && attr)  listVariableName.Add(var_name);
00409
00410
00411         delete msg;
00412         //std::cerr << "Retour de Process\n";
00413         return attr;
00414     }
00415     //std::cerr << "No Message \n";
00416     return NULL;
00417 }
00418
00419
00420 VariableAttribute* ControlClient::QueryVariableModif(const SimpleString var_name, const SimpleString value_str)
00421 {
00422     VariableAttribute* var_attr = FindVariable(var_name);
00423     if(!var_attr)
00424     {
00425         OmiscidTrace( "Unknown Variable '%s' : Not Available Description.\n", var_name.GetStr());
00426         return NULL;
00427     }
00428
00429     SimpleString request = "<variable name=\"" + SimpleString(var_name) + "\">";
00430
00431
00432     request +=  "<value>";
00433     VariableAttribute::PutAValueInCData(value_str, request);
00434     request += "</value>";
00435     request += "</variable>";
00436     XMLMessage* msg = QueryToServer(request);
00437     if(msg)
00438     {
00439         VariableAttribute* attr = NULL;
00440         if(msg->GetRootNode()->children != NULL)
00441         {
00442             attr = ProcessVariableDescription(msg->GetRootNode()->children, var_attr);
00443         }
00444         delete msg;
00445         return attr;
00446     }
00447     return NULL;
00448 }

00460         }
00461     }
00462
00463     SimpleString request = "<"+InOutputAttribute::input_str+" name=\"" + SimpleString(input_name) + "\"/>";

00470             attr = ProcessInputDescription(msg->GetRootNode()->children, input_attr);

00480         else if(!name_in_list && attr) listInputName.Add(input_name);
00481
00482         delete msg;

00530 InOutputAttribute* ControlClient::QueryInOutputDescription(const SimpleString in_output_name)
00531 {
00532     InOutputAttribute* in_output_attr = FindInOutput(in_output_name);
00533     bool name_in_list = true;
00534     if(!in_output_attr)
00535     {
00536         if(!NameInList(in_output_name, listInOutputName))
00537         {
00538             OmiscidTrace( "Unknown InOutput '%s', ask to the service.\n", in_output_name.GetStr());
00539             name_in_list = false;
00540         }
00541     }
00542
00543     SimpleString request = "<"+InOutputAttribute::inoutput_str+" name=\"" + SimpleString(in_output_name) + "\"/>";
00544     XMLMessage* msg = QueryToServer(request);
00545     if(msg)
00546     {
00547         InOutputAttribute* attr = NULL;
00548         if(msg->GetRootNode()->children != NULL)
00549         {
00550             attr = ProcessInOutputDescription(msg->GetRootNode()->children, in_output_attr);
00551         }
00552         if(!in_output_attr && attr) listInOutputAttr.Add(attr);
00553         else if(in_output_attr && !attr)
00554         {
00555             listInOutputAttr.Remove(in_output_attr);
00556             delete in_output_attr;
00557         }
00558
00559         if(name_in_list && !attr) listInOutputName.Remove(in_output_name);
00560         else if(!name_in_list && attr) listInOutputName.Add(in_output_name);
00561
00562         delete msg;
00563         //std::cerr << "Retour de Process\n";
00564         return attr;
00565     }
00566     //std::cerr << "No Message \n";
00567     return NULL;
00568 }

00570 bool ControlClient::QueryDetailedDescription()
00571 {
00572     SimpleString request = "<fullDescription/>";
00573     XMLMessage* msg = QueryToServer(request);
00574
00575     if ( msg )
00576     {
00577         ProcessDetailedDescription( msg );
00578
00579         // delete msg
00580         delete msg;
00581     }
00582
00583     return true;
00584 }
00585
00586 XMLMessage* ControlClient::QueryToServer(SimpleString& request, bool wait_answer)
00587 {
00588     unsigned int msg_id = BeginEndTag(request);
00589
00590 #ifdef DEBUG
00591     // In debug mode, we validate xml before sending it, but nevertheless we send it...
00592     // just for warning and conformity
00593     if ( ControlQueryValidator.ValidateDoc( request ) == false )
00594     {
00595         OmiscidError( "ControlClient::QueryToServer: bad query sent.\n" );
00596     }
00597 #endif
00598 
00599     AnswerWaiter * pWaiter = NULL;
00600
00601     // Create an answer waiter
00602     if ( wait_answer == true )
00603     {
00604         pWaiter = CreateAnswerWaiter( msg_id );
00605         if ( pWaiter == NULL )
00606         {
00607             return NULL;
00608         }
00609     }
00610
00611     if ( SendToServer((int)request.GetLength(), request.GetStr()) == SOCKET_ERROR )
00612     {
00613         // If we can not send data, free the waiter...
00614         pWaiter->Free();
00615         return NULL;
00616     }
00617
00618     if ( wait_answer == false ) // For request without answer like (un)subscribe...
00619     {
00620         // Ok, we will not wait for anything...
00621         return NULL;
00622     }
00623
00624     return pWaiter->GetAnswer(TIME_TO_WAIT_ANSWER);
00625 }
00626
00627 unsigned int ControlClient::BeginEndTag(SimpleString& str)
00628 {
00629     TemporaryMemoryBuffer tmp(10);
00630     snprintf((char*)tmp, 10, "%08x", id);
00631     id++;
00632     SimpleString tmp_str(tmp);
00633     str = "<controlQuery id=\"" + tmp_str + "\">"
00634         + str
00635         + "</controlQuery>";
00636
00637     return id - 1;
00638 }
00639
00640 void ControlClient::ProcessGlobalDescription(XMLMessage* xml_msg)
00641 {
00642     Init();
00643
00644     xmlNodePtr cur_node = xml_msg->GetRootNode()->children;
00645     for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00646     {
00647         const char* node_name = (const char*)cur_node->name;
00648
00649         xmlAttrPtr attr_name = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", cur_node);
00650         if(attr_name)
00651         {
00652             SimpleString name((const char*)attr_name->children->content);
00653
00654             if( VariableAttribute::variable_str == node_name )
00655             {
00656                 listVariableName.Add(name);
00657             }
00658             else if( InOutputAttribute::input_str == node_name )
00659             {
00660                 listInputName.Add(name);
00661             }
00662             else if( InOutputAttribute::output_str == node_name )
00663             {
00664                 listOutputName.Add(name);
00665             }
00666             else if( InOutputAttribute::inoutput_str == node_name )
00667             {
00668                 listInOutputName.Add(name);
00669             }
00670             else
00671             {
00672                 OmiscidError( "unwaited tag : %s\n", node_name);
00673             }
00674         }
00675     }
00676 }
00677
00678 void ControlClient::ProcessDetailedDescription(XMLMessage* xml_msg)
00679 {
00680     InOutputAttribute * pAtt;
00681     VariableAttribute * pVar;
00682
00683     Init();
00684
00685     // Reset
00686     xmlNodePtr cur_node = xml_msg->GetRootNode()->children;
00687     for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00688     {
00689         SimpleString name = (const char*)(cur_node->name);
00690         // std::cerr << "tag name="<<(*it)->name <<"\n";
00691         if( name == InOutputAttribute::input_str.GetStr() )     // an Inpout
00692         {
00693             pAtt = ProcessInputDescription( cur_node, NULL );
00694             if ( pAtt != NULL )
00695             {
00696                 listInputName.Add( pAtt->GetName() );
00697                 listInputAttr.Add( pAtt );
00698             }
00699         }
00700         else if ( name == InOutputAttribute::output_str.GetStr() ) // an Output
00701         {
00702             pAtt = ProcessOutputDescription( cur_node, NULL );
00703             if ( pAtt != NULL )
00704             {
00705                 listOutputName.Add( pAtt->GetName() );
00706                 listOutputAttr.Add( pAtt );
00707             }
00708         }
00709         else if ( name == InOutputAttribute::inoutput_str.GetStr() ) // an InOutput
00710         {
00711             pAtt = ProcessInOutputDescription( cur_node, NULL );
00712             if ( pAtt != NULL )
00713             {
00714                 listInOutputName.Add( pAtt->GetName() );
00715                 listInOutputAttr.Add( pAtt );
00716             }
00717         }
00718         else if( name == VariableAttribute::variable_str.GetStr() )
00719         {
00720             pVar = ProcessVariableDescription( cur_node, NULL );
00721             if ( pVar != NULL )
00722             {
00723                 listVariableName.Add( pVar->GetName() );
00724                 listVariableAttr.Add( pVar );
00725             }
00726         }
00727         else
00728         {
00729             // Should not appear
00730             OmiscidError( "unknown tag : %s\n", name.GetStr() );
00731         }
00732     }
00733     // OmiscidError( "Send : %s \n", str.GetStr());
00734 }
00735
00736 VariableAttribute* ControlClient::ProcessVariableDescription(xmlNodePtr node,
00737                                                             VariableAttribute* var_attr)
00738 {
00739     if( !node || VariableAttribute::variable_str != (const char*)node->name )
00740         return NULL;
00741
00742 #if defined DEBUG
00743     // XMLMessage::DisplayNode(node, stderr);
00744 #endif
00745 
00746     VariableAttribute* vattr = NULL;
00747     if(var_attr)
00748     {
00749         vattr = var_attr;
00750     }
00751     else
00752     {
00753         vattr = new OMISCID_TLM VariableAttribute();
00754     }
00755
00756     vattr->ExtractDataFromXml(node);
00757
00758     return vattr;
00759 }
00760
00761 InOutputAttribute* ControlClient::ProcessInputDescription(xmlNodePtr node, InOutputAttribute* input_attr)
00762 {
00763     //std::cerr << "ControlClient::ProcessInputDescription : Not Yet Implemented\n";
00764     if( !node || InOutputAttribute::input_str != (const char*)node->name )
00765         return NULL;
00766     InOutputAttribute* inattr = NULL;
00767     if(input_attr) inattr = input_attr;
00768     else inattr = new OMISCID_TLM InOutputAttribute("", AnInput);
00769
00770     inattr->ExtractDataFromXml(node);
00771
00772     return inattr;
00773 }
00774 InOutputAttribute* ControlClient::ProcessOutputDescription(xmlNodePtr node, InOutputAttribute* output_attr)
00775 {
00776     //std::cerr << "ControlClient::ProcessOutputDescription : Not Yet Implemented\n";
00777     if(!node || InOutputAttribute::output_str != (const char*)node->name )
00778         return NULL;
00779     InOutputAttribute* outattr = NULL;
00780     if(output_attr)
00781     {
00782         outattr = output_attr;
00783     }
00784     else
00785     {
00786         outattr = new OMISCID_TLM InOutputAttribute(SimpleString::EmptyString, AnOutput);
00787     }
00788     outattr->ExtractDataFromXml(node);
00789
00790     return outattr;
00791 }
00792 InOutputAttribute* ControlClient::ProcessInOutputDescription(xmlNodePtr node, InOutputAttribute* in_output_attr)
00793 {
00794     //std::cerr << "ControlClient::ProcessInOutputDescription : Not Yet Implemented\n";
00795     if(!node || InOutputAttribute::inoutput_str != (const char*)node->name)
00796         return NULL;
00797     InOutputAttribute* in_outattr = NULL;
00798     if(in_output_attr) in_outattr = in_output_attr;
00799     else in_outattr = new OMISCID_TLM InOutputAttribute("", AnInOutput);
00800
00801     in_outattr->ExtractDataFromXml(node);
00802
00803     return in_outattr;
00804 }

00806 void ControlClient::DisplayListName(SimpleList<SimpleString>& list_name,
00807                                     const SimpleString& entete)
00808 {
00809     printf("%s\n", entete.GetStr());
00810     for(list_name.First(); list_name.NotAtEnd(); list_name.Next())
00811     {
00812         printf("\t %s\n", (list_name.GetCurrent()).GetStr());
00813     }
00814 }
00815
00816 bool ControlClient::NameInList(const SimpleString name, SimpleList<SimpleString>& list_name)
00817 {
00818     for(list_name.First(); list_name.NotAtEnd(); list_name.Next())
00819     {
00820         if(list_name.GetCurrent() == name) return true;
00821     }
00822     return false;
00823 }

00825
00826 VariableAttribute* ControlClient::FindVariable(const SimpleString name)
00827 {
00828     for(listVariableAttr.First(); listVariableAttr.NotAtEnd();
00829         listVariableAttr.Next())
00830     {
00831         if(( listVariableAttr.GetCurrent())->GetName() == name)
00832             return  listVariableAttr.GetCurrent();
00833     }
00834     return NULL;
00835 }
00836 InOutputAttribute* ControlClient::FindInput(const SimpleString name)
00837 {
00838     for(listInputAttr.First(); listInputAttr.NotAtEnd(); listInputAttr.Next())
00839     {
00840         if((listInputAttr.GetCurrent())->GetName() == name)
00841             return listInputAttr.GetCurrent();
00842     }
00843     return NULL;
00844 }

00848     {
00849         if((listOutputAttr.GetCurrent())->GetName() == name)
00850             return listOutputAttr.GetCurrent();
00851     }
00852     return NULL;

00860             return listInOutputAttr.GetCurrent();

00864
00865 void ControlClient::Subscribe(const SimpleString var_name)
00866 {
00867     VariableAttribute* va = FindVariable(var_name);
00868     if ( va )
00869     {
00870         SimpleString request("<subscribe name=\"");
00871         request = request + va->GetName()  +"\"/>";
00872         XMLMessage* msg = QueryToServer(request, true);
00873         if ( msg )
00874         {
00875             if(msg->GetRootNode()->children != NULL)
00876             {
00877                 ProcessVariableDescription(msg->GetRootNode()->children, va);
00878             }
00879         }
00880     }
00881     else
00882     {
00883         OmiscidTrace( "variable unknown by client\n");
00884     }
00885 }
00886 void ControlClient::Unsubscribe(const SimpleString var_name)
00887 {
00888     VariableAttribute* va = FindVariable(var_name);
00889     if(va)
00890     {
00891         SimpleString request("<unsubscribe name=\"");
00892         request = request + va->GetName()  +"\"/>";
00893         QueryToServer(request, false);
00894     }
00895     else
00896     {
00897         OmiscidTrace( "variable unknown by client\n");
00898     }
00899 }
00900
00901 void ControlClient::ProcessAMessage(XMLMessage* msg)
00902 {
00903     if ( msg == NULL )
00904     {
00905         // Nothing to do
00906         return;
00907     }
00908
00909     // Validate against XSD schema
00910     if ( ControlAnswerValidator.ValidateDoc( msg->doc ) == false )
00911     {
00912         // bad message...
00913         OmiscidError( "ControlClient::ProcessAMessage: bad controlAnswer/controlEvent.\n" );
00914         return;
00915     }
00916
00917     if( strcmp((const char*)msg->GetRootNode()->name, "controlAnswer") ==0 )
00918     {
00919         // Set the message and way to the rigth Waiter that is ok
00920         PushAnswer(msg);
00921     }
00922     else if( strcmp((const char*)msg->GetRootNode()->name, "controlEvent") == 0 )
00923     {
00924         CtrlEventProcess( msg );
00925         if ( callback != NULL )
00926         {
00927             callback(msg, userDataPtr);
00928         }
00929     }
00930 }
00931
00932 void ControlClient::CtrlEventProcess(XMLMessage* msg)
00933 {
00934     xmlNodePtr node = msg->GetRootNode();
00935
00936     xmlNodePtr current = node->children;
00937
00938     for(; current != NULL; current = current->next)
00939     {
00940         const char* cur_name = (const char*)current->name;
00941         if( VariableAttribute::variable_str == cur_name )
00942         {
00943             xmlAttrPtr attr_name = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", current);
00944             VariableAttribute* va = FindVariable((const char*)attr_name->children->content);
00945             if(va)
00946             {
00947                 xmlNodePtr val_node = XMLMessage::FindFirstChild("value", current);
00948                 if (val_node)
00949                 {
00950                     va->SetValue((const char*)val_node->children->content);
00951                 }
00952             }
00953             else
00954             {
00955                 OmiscidError( "in CtrlEventProcess : Unknown variable %s\n", (const char*)attr_name->children->content);
00956             }
00957         }
00958         else
00959         {
00960             OmiscidError( "in CtrlEventProcess : Unknown control event :%s\n", cur_name);
00961         }
00962     }
00963 }
